thumb.name: Thanks for Hard Work
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe Appreciate You.%3Cbr%3ELisa%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EToday is the perfect chance%3Cbr%3Eto say what we don%26#146;t say%3Cbr%3Eoften enough %26#151;%3Cbr%3EThanks for all%3Cbr%3Eyour hard work%3Cbr%3Eand thoughtful ways.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Great Working with You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks.%3Cbr%3EMarlene%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEven when something%3Cbr%3Ehas to be done %26#147;yesterday%26#148;.%3Cbr%3Esomehow. you find a way%3Cbr%3Eto make it all happen.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENo wonder it%26#146;s so great%3Cbr%3Eworking with you!%3Cbr%3E
